title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials using Supabase authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Submit the login form
User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the analytics dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an appropriate error message is displayed when the user enters invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Submit the login form
Login is rejected and an error message is shown

title: Permission Based UI and Route Access
description: Verify that users see UI elements and routes only according to their role-based permissions and access guards.

steps.description: Login as a user with limited permissions
Navigate through the application pages
UI elements and routes inaccessible by role are hidden or blocked
Attempt to access restricted routes directly via URL
Access is denied or redirected appropriately

title: Create New Client Record with Validation
description: Verify that a client can be created with valid input and proper client-side validation using react-hook-form and Zod.

steps.description: Navigate to the client creation form
Fill all required fields with valid data
Submit the form
New client is created and appears in the clients list

title: Client Form Validation Errors
description: Verify that client form shows validation errors for invalid or missing required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the client creation form
Submit the form without filling required fields
Form shows validation error messages for required fields
Enter invalid field data (e.g., invalid email format)
Form shows validation error for invalid input

title: CRUD Operations on Client Records
description: Verify that clients can be viewed, updated, and deleted properly, with automatic client history tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to clients list
Select a client and open client details
Edit client details with valid changes and save
Client data is updated and changes are reflected
View client history and verify updated changes are logged
Delete the client
Client is removed and history is preserved

title: Create Transaction with Multiple Currencies and Status
description: Verify creating a financial transaction supports selecting currency (USD, CDF, CNY), payment mode and initializing status workflows.

steps.description: Navigate to new transaction form
Select an existing client
Fill transaction details including amount, currency (USD, CDF, or CNY), and payment mode
Submit the transaction
Transaction is saved with correct currency and status set to initial state

title: Transaction Fees, Benefits and Currency Conversion Accuracy
description: Verify that transaction fees, benefits, and currency conversions are automatically calculated based on current system settings and exchange rates.

steps.description: Create a transaction with specified currency and amount
Fees and benefits are calculated correctly based on stored exchange rates and fee settings
Validate fee and benefit calculations for edge cases such as zero or very large amounts
Calculations remain accurate and consistent

title: Transaction Status Workflow Updates
description: Verify that transaction status can be updated correctly, and relevant client history is updated automatically upon status change.

steps.description: Navigate to a pending transaction details
Change the status (e.g., from pending to validated)
Save the status update
Transaction status updates successfully
Associated client history reflects the status change

title: Invoice and Quotation Creation with Automatic Numbering
description: Verify that a user can create and edit invoices and quotations, that numbering is unique per day, and PDFs include all required data.

steps.description: Navigate to the invoice or quotation creation page
Fill all required fields, add product lines, and save
A unique daily number is assigned to the invoice/quotation
Generate PDF of the invoice/quotation
PDF contains all necessary company, client, and product data
Convert a quotation to an invoice
Quotation converts successfully and updates numbering accordingly

title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy and Refresh
description: Verify that the real-time dashboard displays correct statistics, charts, and recent activity, with timely data refreshes.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Statistics and charts show correct and up-to-date data after operations
Perform a data-changing operation such as a new transaction
Dashboard updates in real-time or after a short delay to reflect changes

title: Activity Logging of CRUD Actions and Notifications
description: Verify that all create, read, update, and delete actions across clients, transactions, and invoices are logged with user and timestamp metadata, and notifications are shown.

steps.description: Perform various CRUD operations on clients, transactions, and invoices
Navigate to activity log and notification center
All actions are logged in detail with user info and timestamps
User receives notifications for important system events

title: Bulk Operations on Multiple Records
description: Verify that users can perform bulk operations such as multi-delete and export on selected clients and transactions.

steps.description: Select multiple client or transaction records in the UI
Perform a bulk delete operation
All selected records are deleted with confirmation and activity logged
Select multiple records and perform an export
Export completes successfully and contains all selected data

title: CSV Import for Clients and Transactions with Duplicate Detection
description: Verify that CSV import tool accepts valid files, detects duplicates, and generates validation reports before commit.

steps.description: Navigate to the CSV import tool
Upload a properly formatted CSV file with new records
Records are validated and imported successfully
Upload a CSV file containing duplicate records
Duplicates are detected and reported, with user options to skip or overwrite

title: Settings Update and Persistence
description: Verify that administrators can update company info, payment methods, exchange rates, and fees in settings, and changes persist and affect calculations accordingly.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to settings pages
Modify exchange rates and transaction fee settings
Save the settings
Settings persist after page reload
Create a transaction that uses the updated rates and fees
Transaction fees and conversions reflect the updated settings

title: Responsive Layout and Navigation
description: Verify that the application layout, header, and sidebar navigation are responsive and correctly adapt across various device sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on multiple screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Header and sidebar navigation layout adjust appropriately
All navigation elements remain accessible and usable

title: Server-side RLS and Access Control Verification
description: Verify that Supabase Row-Level Security and access control policies enforce data access on the server-side consistent with user roles and permissions.

steps.description: Login as user with limited role
Attempt to access data objects outside user permission scope via API calls
Access is denied by RLS policies and data is not exposed
Repeat with admin user to confirm full data access
Admin user accesses all intended data

title: Performance: Pagination and Lazy Loading Verification
description: Verify that data tables implement pagination and lazy loading for efficient rendering and querying of large datasets.

steps.description: Navigate to clients and transactions listing pages with large datasets
Only a limited number of items are loaded initially
Trigger loading of additional items via pagination or scrolling
Additional data loads correctly without performance degradation
